name: @teamcoder/mqtttopicvalidator
description: This module is small but easy to use. The purpose of this module is to check the topic of a MQTT object if t valid. Why a simple compare function is not always sufficient. A topic must sometimes be compared with wildcards to validate that it is a valid topic. So this library can tell you if a topic is valid against a compared topic which can contain MQTT wildcards.
author: CreepyCoderMC
